Function reference

Datetime Steps

step_time_event()
Indicate Recurrent Date Time Event
step_difftime()
difftimearithmic Transformation
step_date_after()
Time after Recurrent Date Time Event
step_date_before()
Time before Recurrent Date Time Event
step_date_nearest()
Time to Nearest Recurrent Date Time Event

Normalization

step_maxabs()
Perform Max Abs Scaling
step_minmax()
Perform Min Max Scaling
step_robust()
Perform Robust Scaling
step_unit_normalize()
Perform Unit Normalization

Level Collapsing

step_combine_stringdist()
Combine factor levels using stringdist

Meme Steps

step_yeet()
Removes date and datetimes variables

Tidy Methods

tidy(<step_combine_stringdist>) tidy(<step_date_after>) tidy(<step_date_before>) tidy(<step_date_nearest>) tidy(<step_difftime>) tidy(<step_maxabs>) tidy(<step_minmax>) tidy(<step_robust>) tidy(<step_time_event>) tidy(<step_unit_normalize>) tidy(<step_yeet>)
